title: AdvancedAbilities|超级技能|爆炸箭问题
author: OPwsxwsa
txt_content: 怎么让爆炸箭可以爆炸  但是不破坏地形

replies.author: 大海Sea
replies.txt_content:
abilities里面的explosive_arrow
explosion: true
改为explosion: false

replies.author: OPwsxwsa
replies.txt_content:
972063175 发表于 2020-1-10 12:03
abilities里面的explosive_arrow
explosion: true
改为explosion: false
这个不是关闭爆炸吗

replies.author: 大海Sea
replies.txt_content:
OPwsxwsa 发表于 2020-1-11 11:40
这个不是关闭爆炸吗
你不是就要关闭爆炸又不破坏地形吗，你试试不就知道了

replies.author: OPwsxwsa
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 OPwsxwsa 于 2020-1-15 20:35 编辑 
972063175 发表于 2020-1-11 11:46
你不是就要关闭爆炸又不破坏地形吗，你试试不就知道了
我这没有explosion: true

# The ability ID is the file name!
# Set to false if you don't want this ability enabled, if you don't want to remove your ability file you can disable it.
enable: true

# Set the name of ability, this is not the id (ID is the file name).
name: '爆炸箭头'

# Set the max level to this ability.
max_level: 8

# Item is displayed in the menu as <MATERIAL_ID>,<MATERIAL_DATA>,<MATERIAL_AMOUNT>,<ENCHANTMENT_BOOLEAN>.
logo_item: '261,0,1,false'

# Add here custom locations to disable RPG events.
# Format: '<LOCATION>=<ID>,<ID_2>,<ID_3>...'
# Locations [Special locations]:
#- world [sc, world, plotworld, DIM1]
# - worldguard_region [not_pvp, not_exploitable, not_buildable, *].
# - faction [WarZone, SafeZone, *].
# - towny [wilderness, WarZone, not_pvp, *].
disabled_locations:
- 'worldguard_region=*'
- 'towny=*'
- 'faction=*'

# This will be the ability logo description.
description:
- '{messages_file.explosive_arrow.description}'

    # - price: Set a price to buy this level, example: 'price=1000'
    # - currency: Set a currency type to the price, default is 'vault', all: [none, vault, playerpoints] also you can hook your money plugin using the API.

    buying_options:

# # ==============================
# #        TUTORIAL (v1.0.3)
# # ==============================
# #
# # - Format: 'LEVEL=<level_number>:<condition/effect/option>=<condition/effect/option_value>'
# # - Set TARGET: You can set the target(entity) using "TARGET=<TARGET_ENTITY>" read supported targets in 'Events' section, default target is 'SELF' ('SELF' is the player that casted the ability).
# # - Set LOCATION: You can set location if you want to modify current target location, use: "LOCATION=<LEFT_RIGHT>,<BACK_FORWARD>,<UP_DOWN>,<ANGLE>" (ex: 'triple_arrow_shot' ability).
# # - Set PROJECTILE_TRAIL: You can set projectile trail using: "PROJECTILE_TRAIL=<PARTICLE_TYPE>,<TICKS>" (ex: 'explosive_arrow' ability).
# # - Set CHANCE_TO_RUN: You can set chance to run a condition, option, effect: "CHANCE_TO_RUN=<NUMBER>" (ex: 'vampire_mode' ability).
# # - Set RANDOM: You can create a ID list and the plugin will choose a condition, option, effect randomly: "RANDOM=<ID>" (ex: 'pirate' ability).
# # - Set CONDITION: You can set a condition to run a condition, option, effect: "CONDITION=<CONDITION_FROM_LIST=CONDITION_VALUES>" (ex: 'mining_luck' ability).
# # - Set CONDITION_OR: You can use this when you want to get a 'true' value in many conditions, example checking blocks or player hand items: "CONDITION_OR=<ID>" (ex: 'aggressive_mode' ability).
# # - Use custom variables/placeholders to get a specific value:
# #   * {SELF_NAME}.
# #   * {SELF_HEALTH}.
# #   * {SELF_MAX_HEALTH}.
# #   * {ENTITY_NAME}.
# #   * {ENTITY_HEALTH}.
# #   * {ENTITY_MAX_HEALTH}.
# #   * {BOW_POWER}.
# #   * {EVENT_DAMAGE}.
# #   * {BLOCK_TYPE}.
# #   * {DROP_TYPE}.
# #   * {BLOCK_DROP_SIZE}.
# #   * {RANDOM_NUMBER;<MAX_NUMBER>}.
# #   * {RANDOM_NUMBER;<MIN_NUMBER>_<MAX_NUMBER>}.
# #   * {STORAGE_<ID>}. | This is the global ability storage
# #   * {PLAYER_STORAGE_<ID>}. | This storage is only for the player but it will never be removed.
# #   * {PLAYER_UNIQUE_STORAGE_<ID>}. | This storage is only for the player but it will be removed when ability ends.
# # - Use !INVERSE to inverse the condition, example if you are using 'HEARTS' condition then plugin will check if the entity has
# #   more hearts than the condition value, but if you add !INVERSE, plugin checks if the entity has less hearts than the condition value.
# #   Example: LEVEL=1:HEARTS=5!INVERSE
# # - Use !IGNORE_CHECK to skip value verification! (example: "GREATER_THAN=1,{PLAYER_UNIQUE_STORAGE_TEST}!IGNORE_CHECK", because "{PLAYER_UNIQUE_STORAGE_TEST}" isn't a number.
# # - Use !INSTANT_EVENT_CALL to call the event instantly instead of wait current event ends.
# # - Use "Arithmetic Operators symbols":
# #   * Addition: 2 + 2
# #   * Subtraction: 2 - 2
# #   * Multiplication: 2 * 2
# #   * Division: 2 / 2
# #   * Exponentiation: 2 ^ 2
# #   * Unary Minus, Plus(Sign Operators): +2 - (-2)
# #   * Modulo: 2 % 2
# #   Example: LEVEL=1:HEARTS=({ENTITY_HEALTH}/5)*2
# # - Be careful adding 'condition/effect/option' with big values, this can affect the server performance!
# # - Use "/abilities creator info" to see all DAMAGE_CAUSES, SPECIAL_PARTICLES, PARTICLES, SOUNDS, POTION_EFFECTS available in your server version!
# # - See all events, conditions, effects, options using "/abilities creator <events/conditions/effects/options>".
# #
# #
# # WIKI: https://www.spigotmc.org/wiki/advancedabilities-creator/
# #
# # ==============================


# Create custom ability events here!
creator:
  # Add here main events you will want to use.
  events:
    '1':
      # Set the event name.
      event: ShootBowEvent
      # Add here conditions.
      conditions:
        - 'LEVEL=ALL:BOW_POWER=0.2!INVERSE'
        - 'LEVEL=1:CHANCE=7'
        - 'LEVEL=2:CHANCE=12'
        - 'LEVEL=3:CHANCE=16'
        - 'LEVEL=4:CHANCE=18'
        - 'LEVEL=5:CHANCE=22'
        - 'LEVEL=6:CHANCE=27'
        - 'LEVEL=7:CHANCE=35'
        - 'LEVEL=8:CHANCE=39'
        - 'LEVEL=ALL:API_EVENT_CANCELLED=API_LOCATION_SUPPORT!INVERSE'
      # Add here effects.
      effects:
        - 'LEVEL=ALL:PROJECTILE_TRAIL=LAVA_POP,1:ARROW={BOW_POWER},false,0'
      # Add here options.
      options:
        - 'LEVEL=ALL:ACTION_BAR_MESSAGE'
        - 'LEVEL=ALL:PARTICLES=FLAME'
        - 'LEVEL=ALL:CANCEL_EVENT'
      # Add here secondary events you want to use, secondary events will be called if the main event was called.
      secondary_events:
        '1':
          # Set the secondary event.
          event: ProjectileEffectLaunchEvent
          # Add here conditions.
          conditions: []
          # Add here effects.
          effects: []
          # Add here options.
          options:
            - 'LEVEL=ALL:TARGET=PROJECTILE:SET_CUSTOM_NAME=true,&c&lBOOM!'
            - 'LEVEL=ALL:PLAYER_UNIQUE_STORAGE_SET=SOUND,0'
            - 'LEVEL=ALL:START_REPEATING_TASK=SOUND_ID,false,0,0.2'
        '2':
          # Set the secondary event.
          event: ArrowHitEvent
          # Add here conditions.
          conditions:
            - 'LEVEL=ALL:TARGET=PROJECTILE:API_EVENT_CANCELLED=API_LOCATION_SUPPORT!INVERSE'
          # Add here effects.
          effects:
            - 'LEVEL=1:TARGET=PROJECTILE:ANIMATED_EXPLOSION=1,true!INSTANT_EVENT_CALL'
            - 'LEVEL=1:TARGET=PROJECTILE:RADIUS_PUSH=0,0.32,1!INSTANT_EVENT_CALL'
            - 'LEVEL=2:TARGET=PROJECTILE:ANIMATED_EXPLOSION=1.5,true!INSTANT_EVENT_CALL'
            - 'LEVEL=2:TARGET=PROJECTILE:RADIUS_PUSH=0,0.32,1.5!INSTANT_EVENT_CALL'
            - 'LEVEL=3:TARGET=PROJECTILE:ANIMATED_EXPLOSION=1.7,true!INSTANT_EVENT_CALL'
            - 'LEVEL=3:TARGET=PROJECTILE:RADIUS_PUSH=0,0.32,1.7!INSTANT_EVENT_CALL'
            - 'LEVEL=4:TARGET=PROJECTILE:ANIMATED_EXPLOSION=1.9,true!INSTANT_EVENT_CALL'
            - 'LEVEL=4:TARGET=PROJECTILE:RADIUS_PUSH=0,0.32,1.9!INSTANT_EVENT_CALL'
            - 'LEVEL=5:TARGET=PROJECTILE:ANIMATED_EXPLOSION=2.1,true!INSTANT_EVENT_CALL'
            - 'LEVEL=5:TARGET=PROJECTILE:RADIUS_PUSH=0,0.32,2.1!INSTANT_EVENT_CALL'
            - 'LEVEL=6:TARGET=PROJECTILE:ANIMATED_EXPLOSION=2.2,true!INSTANT_EVENT_CALL'
            - 'LEVEL=6:TARGET=PROJECTILE:RADIUS_PUSH=0,0.32,2.2!INSTANT_EVENT_CALL'
            - 'LEVEL=7:TARGET=PROJECTILE:ANIMATED_EXPLOSION=2.3,true!INSTANT_EVENT_CALL'
            - 'LEVEL=7:TARGET=PROJECTILE:RADIUS_PUSH=0,0.32,2.3!INSTANT_EVENT_CALL'
            - 'LEVEL=8:TARGET=PROJECTILE:ANIMATED_EXPLOSION=2.5,true!INSTANT_EVENT_CALL'
            - 'LEVEL=8:TARGET=PROJECTILE:RADIUS_PUSH=0,0.32,2.5!INSTANT_EVENT_CALL'
          # Add here options.
          options:
            - 'LEVEL=ALL:TARGET=PROJECTILE:LOCATION=0,0,0.3,0:SPECIAL_PARTICLES=CIRCLE,LAVA_POP,40,3'
            - 'LEVEL=ALL:TARGET=PROJECTILE:LOCATION=0,0,1.3,0:SPECIAL_PARTICLES=CIRCLE,LAVA_POP,40,3'
            - 'LEVEL=ALL:TARGET=PROJECTILE:LOCATION=0,0,2.3,0:SPECIAL_PARTICLES=CIRCLE,LAVA_POP,40,3'
            - 'LEVEL=ALL:TARGET=PROJECTILE:REMOVE_ENTITY'
            - 'LEVEL=ALL:CANCEL_TASK=SOUND_ID'
        '3':
          # Set the secondary event.
          event: RepeatingTaskEvent
          # Add here conditions.
          conditions: []
          # Add here effects.
          effects: []
          # Add here options.
          options:
            - 'LEVEL=ALL:SOUND=true,UI_BUTTON_CLICK,0.9,{PLAYER_UNIQUE_STORAGE_SOUND}!IGNORE_CHECK'
            - 'LEVEL=ALL:PLAYER_UNIQUE_STORAGE_SET=SOUND,{PLAYER_UNIQUE_STORAGE_SOUND}+0.1'
            - 'LEVEL=ALL:TARGET=PROJECTILE:CONDITION=IS_ON_GROUND:CANCEL_TASK=SOUND_ID'
            - 'LEVEL=ALL:TARGET=PROJECTILE:CONDITION=IS_ON_GROUND:REMOVE_ENTITY'
        '4':
          # Set the secondary event.
          event: ExplosionEffectBlockEvent
          # Add here conditions.
          conditions: []
          # Add here effects.
          effects: []
          # Add here options.
          options:
            - 'LEVEL=ALL:TARGET=BLOCK:CONDITION=API_EVENT_CANCELLED=API_LOCATION_SUPPORT:CANCEL_EVENT'
            - 'LEVEL=ALL:TARGET=BLOCK:CONDITION=CHECK_LOCATION=!INVERSE:CANCEL_EVENT'
        '5':
          # Set the secondary event.
          event: EntityRadiusPushEvent
          # Add here conditions.
          conditions: []
          # Add here effects.
          effects: []
          # Add here options.
          options:
            - 'LEVEL=ALL:TARGET=ENTITY:CONDITION=API_EVENT_CANCELLED=API_LOCATION_SUPPORT:CANCEL_EVENT'
            - 'LEVEL=ALL:TARGET=ENTITY:CONDITION=CHECK_LOCATION=!INVERSE:CANCEL_EVENT'复制代码
